what: Round Numeric Values to the Nearest Integer
title: Round Numeric Values to the Nearest Integer
text: new package function round nearest integer

what: roundR: Round Numeric Values to the Nearest Integer — roundR-package
title: roundR: Round Numeric Values to the Nearest Integer — roundR-package
text: R default choice rounding follows IEC 60559 standard 5 expected rounded even digit. package offers alternative functionality round closest integer.

what: Round to the nearest integer — rounder
title: Round to the nearest integer — rounder
text: Function round rounds - default -  number 1.5 integer 2 number 2.5 also integer 2. reason behaviour IEC 60559 standard 5 expected rounded even digit. function provides integer rounding alternative round.

title: Round to the nearest integer — rounder
Round to the nearest integer — rounder
text: x numeric element vector round nearest integer

title: Round to the nearest integer — rounder
Round to the nearest integer — rounder
text: Gerko Vink g.vink@uu.nl Hanne Oberman h..oberman@uu.nl

title: Round to the nearest integer — rounder
code: library(magrittr) # rounds weirdly c(0.5, 1.5, 2.5, 3.5) %>% round() #> [1] 0 2 2 4 # rounds correctly c(0.5, 1.5, 2.5, 3.5) %>% rounder() #> [1] 1 2 3 4
